The passion of Christ, and the benefits thereby. By Bartholomew Chamberlaine, Doctor in Diuinitie Chamberlaine, Bartholomew, 1545 or 6-1621.
[40] p.
Printed [by T. Snodham] for Thomas Pauier, London : 1613.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
